title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 63 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 63 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;
lineList.cn: （大卫在犹大旷野的时候，作了这诗）神阿，你是我的神，我要切切的寻求你。在乾旱疲乏无水之地，我渴想你，我的心切慕你。

lineList.en: To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.
lineList.cn: 我在圣所中曾如此瞻仰你，为要见你的能力，和你的荣耀。

lineList.en: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.
lineList.cn: 因你的慈爱比生命更好，我的嘴唇要颂赞你。

lineList.en: Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.
lineList.cn: 我还活的时候，要这样称颂你。我要奉你的名举手。

lineList.en: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips:
lineList.cn: 我在床上记念你，在夜更的时候思想你，我的心就像饱足了骨髓肥油。

lineList.en: When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.
lineList.cn: 我也要以欢乐的嘴唇赞美你。

lineList.en: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.
lineList.cn: 因为你曾帮助我，我就在你翅膀的荫下欢呼。

lineList.en: My soul followeth hard after thee: thy right hand upholdeth me.
lineList.cn: 我心紧紧的跟随你。你的右手扶持我。

lineList.en: But those that seek my soul, to destroy it, shall go into the lower parts of the earth.
lineList.cn: 但那些寻索要灭我命的人，必往地底下去。

lineList.en: They shall fall by the sword: they shall be a portion for foxes.
lineList.cn: 他们必被刀剑所杀，被野狗所吃。

lineList.en: But the king shall rejoice in God; every one that sweareth by him shall glory: but the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped.
lineList.cn: 但是王必因神欢喜。凡指着他发誓的，必要夸口。因为说谎之人的口，必被塞住。
